resources.string: Please enter at least 30 random characters. You are NOT required to remember the sequence; it is used internally to increase the security of your information.

Please choose a secure login password at least 30 characters long to prevent unathorized access.
Login password must be at least 30 characters long!
Please choose a secure PIN at least 8 digits long to prevent unauthorized access.
Login password must be at least 8 digits long!

Your device does not appear to have full-device encryption enabled. The application will be password-protected.

Full-device encryption is supported but not enabled on your device. It is recommended that you enable full-device encryption before continuing to install {0}. If you do not encrypt your device, you will have to enter a 30-character password each time you open {0}. Would you like to quit {0} and view online instructions for enabling full-device encryption?

Thank you for taking the time to tell us what you think about {0}! Your suggestions and bug reports are greatly appreciated and will be incorporated into a future release if possible. You can also e-mail us directly at appdev.feedback@gmail.com. If you are submitting a bug report, please mention your {0} version ({1}) and your OS ({2} {3}).

WARNING: Feedback sent from this app will be transmitted over an unsecured connection. If you would normally use a VPN for your communication, please send your feedback to appdev.feedback@gmail.com using your VPN secured e-mail.
